pages.text: $(1)Alchemy Arrays of Crafting$() are one of the simplest forms of array. These arrays inscribe the $(item)base item$() onto the $(item)catalyst$(), transforming them both into a useful item (after a small, pretty animation).
While some of these resulting items can be crafted $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/divination)using very simple ingredients$(/l), others require additional steps to create useful items.
